articles.content:
New Documentary Released 
   Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Scientific Documentary Film Studio recently released "From the Looks of Korean Women".
 The film vividly portrays Korean women dynamically pushing the one wheel of the revolution under the loving care and trust of the three generals of Mt. Paektu.    
 The film also shows the proud appearances of women soldiers defending the socialist homeland with arms of revolution in their hands, wives of officers exalting the noble title of members of cooking section of the Supreme Headquarters and women in the Songun era working hard to assist the People's Army with sincerity and build a great prosperous powerful nation.

articles.content:
Korean Delegations Leave Here to Visit Philippines and Italy
   Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Council of Religionists headed by Chairman Jang Jae On left here today by train to attend a meeting of the Executive Council of the Asian Conference of Religions for Peace to be held in Manila, Philippines.
 A delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union headed by its Central Committee Vice-Chairwoman Ri Yong Hui left here today by train to attend a meeting of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation to be held in Rome, Italy.
